sources.title: Vera (1986)
sources.description: Vera passa a adolescência num orfanato e para se impor, age de forma masculinizada. Quando deixa a instituição, apaixona-se por uma colega de trabalho, o que exacerba mais os seus conflitos internos.

metadata.Plot: Young girl spends her adolescence in an institution for minors, developing some masculine traits in her personality. In this hostile environment, she can only find some sympathy in a teacher. After leaving the place, she falls in love with a divorced woman in her work, mother of a young boy, which aggravates her inner conflicts.
metadata.Actors: Ana Beatriz Nogueira, Raul Cortez, Aida Leiner
